demo.name: brd4104a.demo.btmesh_soc_iop_friend
demo.label: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC IOP Test - Friend node
demo.model:description: Friend example for IOP test. This node acts as a friend for the low power node and caches messages sent to it when the low power node is sleeping.

property.value: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC IOP Test - Friend node
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth\ Mesh

demo.name: brd4104a.demo.btmesh_soc_iop_lpn
demo.label: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC IOP Test - LPN node
demo.model:description: Low power node example for IOP test. This node acts as a typical low power device and sleeps most of the time. It needs a friend node to cache messages and forward them when polled.

property.value: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC IOP Test - LPN node
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth\ Mesh

demo.name: brd4104a.demo.btmesh_soc_iop_relay
demo.label: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC IOP Test - Relay node
demo.model:description: Relay example for IOP test. This node acts as a relay, i.e. if a node is out of range for another node, it relays messages between the two, provided the relay node is in range for both.

property.value: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC IOP Test - Relay node
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth\ Mesh

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.btmesh_soc_provisioner_light_lightness
demo.label: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC Provisioner Light Lightness
demo.model:description: An out-of-the-box software demo which can provision and configure nearby switch devices. The LEDs of the mainboard can be switched on and off and their lighting intensity can be set either by push buttons or by the provisioned switches.

property.value: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC Provisioner Light Lightness
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth\ Mesh
